text.section:
The disclosure statement shall contain a cover page that states, in a prominent location and type face:
the date of the disclosure statement; and
that the issuance of a certificate of registration does not:
constitute approval, recommendation, or endorsement of the facility by the Department; or
evidence or attest to the accuracy or completeness of the information in the disclosure statement.

section.section:
This subsection applies to a provider that:
has a continuing care agreement that includes a provision to provide assisted living program services; and
does not execute a separate assisted living agreement.

The provider shall:
give to each subscriber annually and without cost revisions to the disclosure statement provisions under paragraph (2) of this subsection;
ensure that each subscriber or the subscriber's agent initials the revised disclosure statement to acknowledge the revisions; and
make copies of the initialed disclosure statements available for inspection by the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene under Title 19, Subtitle 18 of the Health - General Article.
